creator: ivan@bware.it

text:
Sorry, the RFC is very clear here. I put this bug "wontfix", because I think,
nobody is willing to support such broken software by violating the RFCs.

However, you may switch to Apache 2 and use a connection input filter to fix
this bug. (Type mod_apachecon into your favourite search engine for a good
example ;-).

Thanks for using Apache!
